casebody.data:
Steven FRIEDMAN, M.D., Individually and as Executor of the Estate of Gail Friedman, Deceased, Petitioner
v.
BRYN MAWR HOSPITAL, Allison Williams, PA, Christopher X. Daly, MD, George J. Hart, MD, Grahame C. Gould, MD, Ancy Skariah, DO, Rosemary A. Cook, MD and Main Line Hospitals, Inc., Respondents No. 60 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. July 25, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
